I’m Spyros Kyriazos. I hold a degree in Digital Systems and a Master’s Degree in Network-Oriented Systems.
With over a decade of experience in software design and development, I have consistently leveraged technology to enhance productivity and improve services for both end-users and the Greek public sector.
In the realm of home automation, I am passionate about designing systems that improve daily life, reduce stress, and ensure privacy. My goal is to empower home automation enthusiasts with the knowledge and resources to create their perfect home automation setup.

We collected the quotes with the best advice for a less stressful, happier and more fulfilling life.
The quotes come from a variety of philosophers and schools of thought, so everyone can find something applicable to their everyday life. They are also grouped in categories so you can start focusing on what is important to you.
Use the quotes as a way of thought or a starting point for a discussion and apply them to your daily life. Become a philosopher yourself.
Available as a paperback and e-book on most Amazon marketplaces.
Buy it on most amazon stores.
summary: A book containing advice and words of wisdom from the major schools of Greek thought.
title: Life Advice Book

content:
Local control of your smart home devices and automations provides several advantages over relying on cloud services. Privacy, reliability and speed are some of the benefits. Your private information stay within your home, your devices will continue to work even if the company decides to terminate their cloud services and your automations will run instantly, without having to travel to a remote server around the world to be validated.
Below you can find resources explaining in more detail the importance of a local smart home.
 In this video Lewis Barclay provides his 5 reasons why your smart home should be local  Everything Smart Home on youtube.com     In this article the founder of Home Assistant Paulus Schoutsen explains his vision for the perfect home automation including why your system should run at home and not in the cloud.  Perfect Home Automation
summary: Why local control in your smart home is important
title: Local Smart Home
